mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mkmember(memberno, memcateno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(memberno), 0)+1 as memberno FROM mkmember), #{memcateno}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, memcateno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate FROM mkmember WHERE memcateno=#{memcateno} ORDER BY memberno ASC
